actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-1122.

official_title: Resolution reported authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations for studies in 17 specified areas by the Senate Judiciary Committee and its subcommittees from $4,073,000 to $4,085,000 for the period March 1, 1974 to February 28, 1975.

titles.title: Resolution reported authorizing supplemental expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary.
